​Phase IV (Weeks 14–16): Capstone Presentation & Reflection​
​Goal:​
​Teams synthesize findings into a unified interdisciplinary solution, demonstrate outcomes​
​through presentations, and reflect individually on their learning and contributions.​
​Tasks:​
​●​ ​Group Presentation​
​●​ ​Individual Scientific Essay​
​●​ ​Reflection & Peer Evaluation​
​Group Capstone Project Presentation.​

​When:​​Weeks 14–15​

​Format:​​Group​
